extra: This is a small update, but it brings some nice improvements to the workspace and the overall experience.
fixes: Fixed wrong spacing when using right side tabs

fixes.description: Fixed urlbar being below the tabs visually

fixes: Fixed the browser not closing when the last tab is closed (and the preference is set)
Fixed keyboard shortcuts being restarted on startup, saying they are corrupted

fixes.description: Fixed unfocusing the browser with `widget.gtk.rounded-bottom-corners.enabled` causes the bottom corners to stop being rounded
Fixed a small border being visible at the top of the window

features: New workspace behavior when closing tabs, it's more customizable now
Improved workspace transitioning, giving it a more realistic and smooth feel
Made context switching animations context aware, making them more intuitive
Compact mode now has a better opening transition, like in A*c
Essential tabs now have the favicon as the background
breakingChanges: MacOS users default toolbar layout has the webpanels button removed
